page.title: 04EMPLOYMENT 1.
page.content: Apart from{farming,}there is very little employment within the area. With mechanised farming methods, fewer are now employed on the land. Some farmhouses have been sold off, and in a number of cases the land formerly managed by three tenant farmers, plus staff, is now farmed by one man with occasional help from contractors. The mushroom farm at Plumley employs 5 full and 18 part-time staff. {Garden centres}at Pickmere, Plumley, Lostock Green, and Wincham take advantage of local fertile growing conditions, and provide for the public's current interest in gardening.
